website_summaries.verdict: A versatile jump rope that works for any skill level. Barring one mildly annoying trait, it's a great option for anyone looking to up their cardio game.
pros: Foam padded handles for improved grip
Comes with 2 free ebooks – jump rope techniques and nutrition tips
cons: Rope kinks and twists when not in use
Plastic bearings may not be the most durable

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but seller will spam your inbox.
customer_reviews.text: Four to five star jump rope, but the seller is spamming my inbox with requests for product registration and reviews. This is a really bad trend Amazon sellers are bringing about. Buying your product does not give you cause to blow up people's mailboxes.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Neophyte to jump roping and bought what I thought was the best product via reviews. I was sorely mistaken. 1) Rope portion is (coated in) plastic and is extremely hard to straighten out for a smooth jump. U 2) Length adjustment is via a cheap bolt by the handle and extremely difficult to maneuver. Many other better products if you do the research. Also, there are no returns for this product. Buyer beware - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 6’2. This rope did not reach my armpits when I measured it, and it keeps hitting my feet despite proper form and exaggerated jumps. Why wouldn’t they leave extra slack in the handles? An extra inch or 2 in each handle would’ve been plenty, and there’s certainly space for it. I don’t know how they claim It is long enough for jumpers as tall as 6’10. No way. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: I've done some of the exercises that was recommended and I must say
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying my jump rope... had it for a least two weeks and apologies for the late review. I've done some of the exercises that was recommended and I must say, "I feel it all over my body. I haven't been able to use it for the past few days due to medical reason, but that will soon pass. Easy way to workout without having to do an hour, ten (10) minutes, every day...fun!!
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA

customer_reviews.title: Returned a few others that got tangled in themselves while ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned a few others that got tangled in themselves while in use, this one doesn't suffer that problem. Overall, does its job well. Only negative is that the cord itself feels a bit cheap plastic'y, but I guess that can't be avoided in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Alleborn

customer_reviews.title: Quality jump rope which this certainly is not look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying congratulations to king athletics for designing the worst jumping rope I have ever experienced. Compete junk to say the least. You can’t adjust the rope worth a crap, they put some metal fasteners on the ends that you can’t get off without cutting them. The rope it’s self is very cheap shiny plastic which will crack quickly. Do your self a favor don’t buy this rope unless you just want to waste money, it’s really that bad. Boy it would be nice if this company took some thought before design a jump rope, very disappointing to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Very disappointed customer kelly

customer_reviews.title: Decent Jump Rope
customer_reviews.text: Very functional jump rope. Adjustable length and the handles are adequate, they spin well. I purchased this for my college aged daughter and she loves it. I personally think the rope itself is light but she doesn't have a problem and I don't really have a problem with it. It just feels so light it's hard to sense where it is when spinning. I like to feel the rope accelerating away from me the faster I spin it. Hence only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this hardly counts as a jump rope
customer_reviews.text: This is the crappiest jump rope I've seen. What's more, you cannot return it apparently. I'm sure it's because they know everyone would return the rope. The quality is very poor. I'm not sure what material the rope itself is made of, but it is kinked up and I seriously doubt I can ever use it to skip rope. I read the reviews, but apparently they are from people that don't skip a lot of rope. Every time I think I will try to buy something from amazon again, I am amazed at the poor quality of the product. Time to cancel that prime and quit giving them business.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap product. Opened the package and was very disappointed . I put it back in the box and logged onto amazon to return only to have a notice saying not returnable. Very disappointed. I am a small business owner that places orders with amazon weekly. On occasion I purchased something for myself. After this I will do my personal shopping in person where I can check quality. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: kevin dusoe

customer_reviews.title: If not the best, this jump rope is one of the best
customer_reviews.text: If not the best, this jump rope is one of the best! Once you purchase it, you will receive from the seller an email in which the seller has attached a pdf doc on how to use the jump rope and how to adjust its length (it's a piece of cake). In this pdf doc, there are different exercises one can use with this jump rope and also web links​ for full body exercises using a minimum amount of equipment your body weight and the jump rope! All in all, this is an excellent product, and the attention you get from the seller for the customer's satisfaction is rare!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Too light, too small
customer_reviews.text: The rope is not very satisfying to use. The strand is too light and lags the hands far too much. It is fairly easy to adjust the length - open the end cap, move the metal collar to the new position, and crimp with pliers. However, it is not easy to re-open the metal collar once crimped. The handles are nicely gripped but too slender overall.
customer_reviews.author: Wizardly

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jump rope. Better and very high quality than what I use before. I use to jump rope a lot then stopped and now I am getting back into it. I really do appreciate the videos that came with it. For me this is helping me to get back into a good routine without guessing how long to start without going overboard and injuring myself. Right now I am using my backyard (grassy area) to start. I don't want to scratch up my new rope by jumping on concrete. And I like that my rope was delivered ahead of time stated. Thank you for very good portable and lightweight exercise equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Jump Rope Is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used the jump rope for so long and on a regular basis. It was able to remain in good condition for a while. It eventually snapped due to how constantly I used it. But, it is important to remember that I used it so much; therefore, I believe this was bound to happen after a while. I really appreciate the price. Also, the light weight of this jump rope is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Wish the rope was heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very functional jump rope. Adjustable length and the handles are adequate, they spin well. I purchased this for myself to get back into exercising I personally think the rope itself is light It just feels so light it's hard to sense where it is when spinning. I like to feel the rope accelerating away from me the faster I spin it. I feel if the rope had a little more weight it would work more effectively and efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Mel'a

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second speed rope I have bought. My son appropriated my first one so I had to buy another one for myself. The handles are comfortable. The ball bearings work well. The rope itself is a good weight so I am able to use it at the speed that is comfortable for me. I wish the company would develop a more sophisticated rope clamp for adjustment purposes but the existing one is functional. I appreciate having access to videos of workout routines.
customer_reviews.author: D Lev

customer_reviews.title: My legs are on fire
customer_reviews.text: Well, Ive only used it once. And I got a great workout aftering using it for 2 hours and 15 min. I hadnt jump rope since I was a kid. I improved much within those 2 hours, plus some YouTube videos beforehand to get some important technique down. I'm doing this for better endurance and possibly better cardiovascular health. After just 2 hours I noticed better results and ability. However... since my legs havent bounced that much in years, my calves are destroyed. Ive been avoiding walking on the balls of my feet at all in the passed 3 days. So.. my advice, dont overdue it on the 1st shot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT a quality speed rope!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a speed rope, it’s just a heavy rubber jump rope. The rubber stretches when you spin it so the length changes as you speed up and slow down (ie singles vs doubles). The bearings are junk, not smooth and quick. Changing length is a pain and you only get two chances because they use metal crimp rings instead of an adjustable clamp. NOT recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SAH

customer_reviews.title: Huh?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how anyone is using this jump rope. It doesn’t have nearly enough weight to turn without turning into a whip on the way around. It constantly got tangled mid turn. I couldn’t even get through one session with this. I had welts in my arm. I shouldn’t have tried to save a couple bucks, because now this just collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: Female User

customer_reviews.title: I almost never write negative reviews, but this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write negative reviews, but this thing was a piece of junk. It was already broken (the cord had become separated from the handle) from the time I opened it. This was surprising given all the positive reviews, but it's a fact. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who hasn't jumped rope more than once or twice. He did not like jumping rope until I bought this one. It is sturdy and doesn't tangle. He has already learned a few tricks with it and it keeps him exercising. Fast and on time shipping. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BamaBecky

customer_reviews.title: Strength and Durability
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I originally purchased the jump rope but was unable to use due to a foot injury. The manufacturer of the jump rope company refunded my full purchase without any problem. I would definitely do business with this company in the future. They are a solid company and I highly recommend their product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sivo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to incorporate jumping rope into my workout routine, especially when traveling, and the King Athletic gear is just what I wanted. I haven't had it long, but it has a feel of...substance. It seems durable, the rope rotates freely on the ball bearings, and King Athletic has provided accompanying videos and a training manual. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: PapiDoc

customer_reviews.title: Broke the same day i got it
customer_reviews.text: it broke the same day i got it , fixed it it by just tying it myself so decided not to send it back as it only costed me about 10$ so not worth my time , however under low use 1 of the handles completly broke while using it on the part the rope itselfs enters
customer_reviews.author: Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you cut off excess rope
customer_reviews.text: IF you shorten the rope, make sure you properly secure and cut off the excess rope. If you do not, it will gather in the handle and prevent the rope from rotating properly in the handles, causing tangling.
customer_reviews.author: S Shap

customer_reviews.title: ... 5'11 beginner to jump roping and these are very nice. I didn't even have to adjust the size ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'11 beginner to jump roping and these are very nice. I didn't even have to adjust the size for my height. The handles are a bit big compared to the cheap plastic handles on other jump ropes but that's not a big deal. Seeing as though I'm not experienced enough to do double unders and jump rope with speed, I can't say for sure if it's a good speed rope but I'm sure if you're experienced enough, you can accomplish it with these. The rope is durable and it won't come out of the handles easily.
customer_reviews.author: g00d buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Remark: - the line is durable but stiff, so the folds made in the wire for shipping remain even during use unless enough centrifugal force is generated to cause the wire to straighten during use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME JUMP ROPE!!!!!!!!!! THRILLED WITH PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome jump rope! I have tried MANY different jump ropes over the years but nothing compares to this one. It is a large jump rope but it is adjustable. Great product, I will probably purchase a few more. It got here quicker than I ever expected! It is a very sturdy rope and i've been using everyday since I got it. I'm really loving it! Thanks for a great product! I recommend this jump rope to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: horseslop

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Expected the cord to be more pliant, but it's one of the ones that if bent retains the bend forever unless you apply a lot of force. Note also that it's not "resizable", it's "sizable", as in once you get it you can size it however you like but you're stuck with that setting since you have to cut off the excess to put it back together properly. It's entirely possible I'm just not pro enough to use this (i.e maybe if you go fast and hard it gets all the kinks out from it). Not newbie friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: our handle falls off
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a higher review if I had reviewed it within the first month, but after some minimal use in the months since buying this, the handle came off. We put it back on but it comes off easily now.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Durable material !
customer_reviews.text: The rope is lightweight but durable. It is one of my favorite fitness training equipment now. It is very simple to use as well. You just untangle it and jump. It is small so you can put it in your purse or bag. Then you can have a little mini exercise session anywhere and anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Linda N.

customer_reviews.title: Light and easier to use than regular store bought rope.
customer_reviews.text: I found this Rope to be satisfactory because when using it for the regular two step jumps, it was easier to use than any dollar store bought jump rope because it was both lighter, and longer as well. Not to mention that it seemed more aerodynamic(or it seemed to move better than the store bought one).
customer_reviews.author: David Laitinen

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first...
customer_reviews.text: I started off really enjoying this rope, but it didn't last. As a new jumper, I liked the meaty grips and the weight of the rope...great for jumping at a moderate pace. However, as a "speed rope" this rope didn't cut it. At first I was able to use it for speed, however, over a couple of weeks the rope did not spin as freely inside of the handles. Only one adjustment was ever made to one handle, and it operated fine immediately after. I wish it had continued to operate well because I liked that it was fast, but not as fast and wispy as other more conventional "speed ropes."
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumprope!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rope. The handles are comfortable. I found that if you stretch it a little, the kinks from being folded up in shipping come out. It workes really well for me, the length is perfect and it's not too heavy. I would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I mean, I get that its a $12 jump rope, but I could swallow a kite string and crap out a better jump rope than this. The foam grips slip off during use, and if you should make the mistake of taking the cap off to adjust the length, ya better have some glue handy and make sure you get it where ya want it cause good luck getting the cap to stay in place once you take it off!
customer_reviews.author: Ferg1029

customer_reviews.title: Very good jump rope
customer_reviews.text: very very good quality ! My daughter likes it the best and jump rope every day, seller was very thoughtful give me cut rope PDF and also can download jump rope ebook, I have recommended for my friend ! Very good seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rope Even for Newbie!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rope, easy to adjust. The only performance problem I have with it is that I'm a klutz and am still on the learning curve but that's no reflection on the rope. The handles are soft and comfortable, the plastic rope handles well, even though it's still a bit kinked from the box. I'm new to this kind of training and wonder whether I should have gone for the leather model. Bottom line, I'm happy with this jump rope and the 100% guarantee makes it worry free.
customer_reviews.author: Seajess

customer_reviews.title: Rope
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent workout rope. It’s lightweight and has a soft handle. The rope is very long at over 9 feet, which makes it a bit too much for me being under 5.5”. It has elasticity too so it can stretch with you depending on your exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Sais

customer_reviews.title: Good material, but twists too easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent jumprope, but it twists and tangles way too easily while you’re using it- and it is such a pain to twist back to normal while you’re trying to get in a decent jump roping workout.
customer_reviews.author: Luna R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This jump rope is the best I have ever had! I love that I can adjust the length so that it can be used for different people in my home. Great for workouts. Also love that it doesn’t tangle easily while using it. Easy to wrap up and store
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Walker

customer_reviews.title: The bearings used for this product are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't rotate correctly every 10 rotation and gets stuck. This is coming from someone who's used a speed rope for 15 years. I honestly can't stand this product and don't recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s a jump rope. Works as expected. Pretty dang high quality handles tho. And it has a pretty good instruction on how to shorten the jump rope if you are short which is helpful because I am. I have the funniest video of my 1 year old singing into it like a microphone too!
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: it has a lifetime warranty! but make sure you register!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second KA rope. why? well I love it!! best jump rope of all I've tried. why second? because I neglected to register the first one 4 yrs ago and so the warranty was of no use when the 4 yr old rope split in half. I could joke that I am so hot and fast that I melted it but the truth is I have no idea how it split. get this jump rope and register it!
customer_reviews.author: June E. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great addition and best one I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic addition to my work out equipment and routine. The jump rope itself is made very well it doesn’t kink up after being folded, has great flexibility and has great strength to get through my workout. Also with comfort grip handles I don’t loose my grip position. Love the addition of the website with helpful references to workout with the rope.
customer_reviews.author: ryan hollier

customer_reviews.title: got me to loose weight
customer_reviews.text: I keep this jump-rope neatly wrapped on my desk and every hours or so I used it for a few minutes. this really helps me focus and stay fit throughout the day, in just a few minutes. Highly recommend for all adults who work at a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Ruda

customer_reviews.title: Rope WAY too Light
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids maybe. Rope is very light and tangles easily. Handles very light as well which is okay but I wish I spent a little more money and got a rope with a weighted rope which you can actually feel while skipping.
customer_reviews.author: RavenGeo

customer_reviews.title: This product has a high number of reviews because the company solicits reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review in response to a company email asking for reviews, sent a week after purchase. While it is a solid jump rope, it would have been good to know that they solicit reviews, as many shoppers base their purchase decision on the number of ratings. The jump rope itself is solid. I wish it was a little longer, but I'm 6'8''. Also, the handles could be longer, but I may have hands that are above-average size. Overall, solid jump rope. Decent price. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Avocado

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this jump rope and am quite pleased with the product. Before this rope got here I went out and bought jump rope from Target because I didnt want to wait to start my training regimen. The jump rope I got from Target was tangled after unraveling it and impossible to use. This one never tangles and is very easy to use. Its exactly what I was looking for. I'm glad I ordered it because if not I would've been stuck with the store bought jumprope that is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: A jump rope is a jump rope, but I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.text: I used to jump rope a lot in college but haven't done it in several years. With the cold weather I was getting tired of running on a treadmill so I decided to buy this to switch up my workouts a bit. I was a little intimidated when I found out I had to use actual tools like a pliers to adjust the rope length, but it was super easy and I got it to just the right length. I've enjoyed using this and haven't had any problems so I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Grogan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a jump rope but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as smooth as I would like for a speed rope. It is coated. On the pro side it’s light weight and turns with ease. As an athlete/transformation coach, I found myself having to restart several times and I’m really good at this particular exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Paris_Simone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, works well!!
customer_reviews.text: Been incorporating jump roping in my cardio sessions. The foam handles makes it very comfortable, quality is great and love the ability to adjust for shorter people like myself. Would highly recommend this brand if you're looking for a good quality jump rope.
customer_reviews.author: AZRunner83

customer_reviews.title: Nice jump rope
customer_reviews.text: Nice jump rope. Easy to adjust. However, I had the impression that "adjustable" meant you could switch back and forth -make it short for my daughter, make it long for me, then make it short for her to use again. It's actually a one time adjustment because you must cut the extra rope off. I would like to wait until we've used it for a while to see how durable these ropes are, but they do seem to work fine and they appear to seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use... I do not recommended it
customer_reviews.text: The cushions on the handles are great, although if your looking for durability for everyday use? This product isn't for you. I used them every day for a 30 day challenge (approximately 5mins for a warm up) and they gave out with in the first 2 days!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda  De La Riva

customer_reviews.title: Great Speed Rope
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this purchase! Definitely not your standard jump rope. This is a speed jump rope and it's GREAT for my cardio days! It does not tangle and the fact that I can adjust the length is HUGE! (I'm 4'11 Adjusting length is a must) Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good.
customer_reviews.text: The Vinyl "rope" doesn't straighten out; it always has annoying wrinkles in it. The Handles were ok so rather then going through all the trouble to return it, instead I went to a Hardware store and chose a rope that was the right size, heavier in weigh that is used to tow Water skiers by Boats. Not Good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Worst jump rope ever
customer_reviews.text: I had this jump rope a little over a year and this POS still coils! I just tried about everything to straighten the rope. UGH... I jump rope 30-40 mins daily and I spend about half the time trying to untangle this... do yourself a favor and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: H S

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Cardio fitness training at it’sbest. Not your average jump robe. Directions included if you need to adjust the length. Does the job better than similar products I’ve bought in the past. I tried using this while on my trampoline. Double the workout.”
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Great jump rope for the price. Felt real smooth and easy to manouver. Like that it's adjustable as well. Had lots of fun jumping with it. It's a great workout for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Tangle easily
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a heavy duty jump rope this isn't it. I have to purchase another jump rope because this jump rope always gets tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Milagros Zimbelmann

customer_reviews.title: It's a great Jumprope. The only weird thing about it the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Jumprope. The only weird thing about it the instructions don't tell you how to ope the top. I had to use a kitchen knife to pop open the rounded cover at the top of the handles. Other than that it great. I don't like those cable ropes because they come undone from the handle easily. These don't hurt too much when you hit yourself as your trying to learn new jumps. Nothing bad to say really the instructions give you tips too.
customer_reviews.author: FittyP.

customer_reviews.title: very good jump rope with great weight
customer_reviews.text: very good jump rope with great weight. I wish the handles were slightly bigger, which is the only reason I dont give it 5 stars. for people with smaller hands, it is likely perfect. despite that, it is always in my gym bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made yet pricey! (yes you read  that right)
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Weigh almost nothing. Cheap plastic handles. No weights for the hands provided. Honestly the fact that these were over $5 is insulting. Returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Durable lightweight jump rope
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He’s 6 foot tall. Perfect for him. Durable, lightweight, great length. He’s enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amylynn balsdon

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11" and the standard rope is too short! May be a good rope for someone who's 5'7" or smaller.
customer_reviews.author: N2Storms

customer_reviews.title: The shortening issue
customer_reviews.text: I like the rope, I don’t like to much the way of shorten it. The shortening process requires pliers to tight a metal ring. This means that is not made to shortening little by little , it would be tough. So you have to shorten it all at the time. I would prefer a less definitive and easier method to shorten it
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: As of right now my wife and I have used the jump rope outside a couple of times on the cement. It does look durable with the way that it is made. I am 6’0” and there are no problems using it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew17

customer_reviews.title: I got the jump rope but where are the videos
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed I should have read a little more to understand what I was purchasing. I love the jump rope but I was hoping to get a dvd for work outs I don’t even know how to access the workout they say I get for free.
customer_reviews.author: Bina

customer_reviews.title: One durable jump rope!
customer_reviews.text: I love the option of adjusting the rope to your hight. The handles are very comfortable, and have great grip. It's weight is just perfect. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE is a plus! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erum Ahmadani

customer_reviews.title: Great jump rope for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price and includes videos with various workouts. The only slight concern I have is the cord itself to isn’t straight.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on the arms.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a while. Durable. Just super heavy. So when you keep using the jump rope for extended periods of time, it tires your arms. The rope is made of heavy material. Need to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef B.

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: broke within the first use. the clasps to resize are pointless once squeezed tight its impossible to reshape and move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: You need special tools to adjust the length and now I'm not being permitted to make a return within the 30 day window. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well-made. I work as a trainer and use this rope daily. It is nice quality and durable. Nice packaging. An all-around winner.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tobbler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: A good, heavy duty speed rope that actually doesn't weigh very much. My former rope always had kinks in it from being folded and stored, thus it never got used. It's actually going in a yard sale next weekend. This one does not stay kinked, even after being folded. I like that it has a comfortable enough weight to actually swing easy, but they still made it as light as possible. It was very easy to adjust to my height as well. I've been having fun practicing the suggestions on the back of the packaging...been awhile since I've used a jump rope!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Casey

customer_reviews.title: I am 5 11 and have been using jump rope ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 11 and have been using jump rope at my crossfit center and I thought this looked similar to what they have there. However, I found out the length is about 2 inches shorter than ideal forcing me to hold it from the edges of the handles which gets a little uncomfortable. Also after a couple months of owning and using it, the rope still is not completely straight/devoid of kinks. If it was longer, id consider giving it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: herderess

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 3 sessions
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 10" and the rope is short for me. I am pretty avid jumper and jump for 20+ minutes at a time. On my third session, the rope broke at both handles (different times) so I had to tie a knot (and further shorten the rope) to reaffix it at the handles. Then it finally broke in the middle of the rope. Broke in 3 places in under an hour of jumping. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great jump rope. My son kept trying to steal it from me when I use it. The handles are great. They are soft and gives you such a great grip. Definitely one of the very best jump ropes I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Alison S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a King Athletic jump rope and haven't been able to use it at all. The rope keeps releasing from the handles. The silver buckles meant to grip the rope inside the handles do not work. If too loose, the rope disengaged. If too tight, the entire piece falls out of the handle. Any suggestions!?
customer_reviews.author: Seka

customer_reviews.title: Great jump rope!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jump rope for the gym! The speed jump ropes were too thin for my liking - this one has the perfect thickness. It has great movement at the ends (doesn't get tangled up while jumping) Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: InfinitiDR

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: The rope keeps coming apart and slipping out. I should have never brought this it not good and it does not wot at all
customer_reviews.author: Ashley @@@@

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good, the rubber is not very light and not ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, the rubber is not very light and not very heavy, the handles are pleasant, I did not like it because, it was impossible to regulate the length of the rope. But otherwise very high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Patimon

customer_reviews.title: Nice jump rope!
customer_reviews.text: Just started a cardio workout program and bought this jump rope. Since I'm a beginner jump roper, don't have much to say other than it appears to be of good quality, works well and is very similar to the one I used in a fitness center at a four star hotel, which is one reason why I bought it. Only thing is on this one, I may have purchased the wrong length. I'm about 5' 10" and I need to wrap the rope around my fingers on each hand once to get the right length, otherwise it's too long.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Madero

customer_reviews.title: Great jump rope
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jump rope. It is well made and should last a long time. I am a runner, who wanted to add some intense aerobic work that would work different muscles than running, and jump roping is definitely intense! It's also great for getting in some exercise while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Bednar

customer_reviews.title: 1.  The rope must stay in nice shape while jumping.  2. Easy to adjust the length
customer_reviews.text: This looks same as I bought from Big 5. (little bit cheaper price) I give 5, because the company has great desire to improve the quality and for customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: James Jun

customer_reviews.title: Close but not the high speed jump rope you are looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Its just a little better than the average cheap jump rope - i'm still looking for the heavy plastic tube type that you can crank high speed jumping. This one is not it. Crossovers are nearly impossible and I can crank them out on a cheap heavier rope we got at Target all day long.
customer_reviews.author: davcall

customer_reviews.title: Good!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, I like ittttt. Good material, very resistant, you can adjust the jump rope to the correct length. Excellent service, the Amazon seller contact me and gave me free Workout Video Training Program, eBook and Lifetime Warranty Program.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: easy to adapt to any size
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to be able to adapt it to different heights as my husband and I use it... but that's not possible so I'll probably buy one more.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Vasini

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I adjusted it guided by the manual and now every swing the rope twists and eventually gets tangled in my foot. Tried to readjust it and nothing worked. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy K.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: despite the reviews on the product i decided to try it out. It arrived faster than expected, my kids got a hold of it and has been dragged around my house being pulled every which way and as held up.
customer_reviews.author: Princess2426

customer_reviews.title: had difficulties, but probably user error
customer_reviews.text: the rope seems of good quality. as a beginner roper i found it difficult to use and bought a traditional rope with the multicolor plastic cylinder segments that I was able to use and rope with. for experienced ropers I suspect this is a reasonably good quality rope for the price
customer_reviews.author: Hey Dude

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sturdy jump road that is very long but adjustable to any length. Comfortable handles. Highly recommended to add to your fitness routine!
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon1977

customer_reviews.title: Very good rope - speedy, moves with meaning.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" and it was time to replace my jump rope. Bought two others that claimed to be long enough for even tallest, but yet unless I lowered and raised hands signigificantly, it would catch on feet and come too close for comfort over my head. On the 3rd attempt, I bought the King rope. Candidly, I misread the description, I thought it was weighted, which is what I was looking for. That said, the rope/length/speed/handle swivel is great. I hope they come out with a weighted one, but I am good to go with this in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Speed Robe...Really
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light and having jumped rope almost daily since my 2nd knee operation in 1975, I'm not sure I would recommend this product to anyone, especially since the product can not be returned..
customer_reviews.author: L J Flury

customer_reviews.title: Average rope. When you cut it the clamp that unused to keep it inside handle looks flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Average rope. Nothing particular. When you cut it the clamp that unused to keep it inside handle looks flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jump Rope!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jump rope. Long enough for tall people. The foam hand grips don’t slip out of your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Kane

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I jump rope most days of the week. This jump rope is the perfect weight, easy to use and lasts a long time. I have tried a lot of jump ropes. I’m sticking with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My teenage daughter uses it within her workout routine. She said it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Hokulea Nakaahiki

customer_reviews.title: Not really adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The "adjustable" part requires you to take a pair of pliers and squeeze the metal ring at desired length and cut off the excess if it doesn't fit back in the handle. Wouldn't exactly advertise it as "easy" either. However, overall it is a good jump rope
customer_reviews.author: Jw4n9

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok for price I guess but have owned much better
customer_reviews.author: Son of Liberty

customer_reviews.title: best jump rope
customer_reviews.text: I got this jump rope almost two weeks ago and tried the recommended video. And yes it helps a lot especially for a first time mom like me since I am gaining weight after giving birth. I am doing a 15 minute routine with the jump rope and I feel amazing. This is the best jump rope i got...made of a durable material and very light weight. And the price is really cheap...
customer_reviews.author: Yen Brown

customer_reviews.title: great seller and warranty
customer_reviews.text: I jump rope 6X a week, and use this speed rope 3X a week. My previous one finally gave up the ghost after 2 years- they honored the lifetime warranty and sent me a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Max Williams

product_meta.title: Jump Rope Workout Video Training Program Included - New Fitness Skipping Rope Designed for Men & Women - Speed Rope Made for Cardio Exercise - All Jump Ropes Includes 2 Instructional eBooks
feature_bullets: ✅ FREE SHIPPING for all customers within the USA + 200% Return on Investment. Actually, we offer better than money back. If there are any issues with your skip rope, we will send you a new one and give you your money back.

✅ VIDEO & eBOOK Included *SEE EMAIL ATTACHMENT* (usually $36) Workout alongside your personal video trainer and get two eBOOKS which outline a number of great techniques for taking your jump rope workout and nutrition to the next level.

✅ ADJUSTABLE LENGTH - Enjoy the option to adjust the speed rope easily to your desired length. It takes less than 5 minutes! The standard jumping rope is 9'4" in length and designed for adults as tall as 6’4” and kids. A great speed jump rope to take when traveling or to the gym, compact in design it fits easily into your bag.

✅ TANGLE-FREE - Made with our tangle-free rope and combined with super-speed ball bearings that ensures smooth, effortless and even rotation every time. Never again experience the frustration of a twisted jump ropes. This skipping rope is made with custom molded foam grips and built to withstand HEAVY-DUTY use

✅ DESIGNED for FITNESS - This workout jump rope was made to help build endurance, stamina and speed while improving your muscles tone throughout your entire body. It is a classic favourite for men and women in Boxing, MMA, Cross Fit and Cross Training.
